input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Classic Evergreen Spruce Traditional Green'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 7ft Pre-Lit Full Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 4.5 ft Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Wondershop 7' Pre-Lit Alberta Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Pre-lit 5' Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Pines Cones and 200 Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Deluxe Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Dual Color LED Lights'
  - Name='Green Alcott 6' Tall Prelit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6.5 ft. Downswept Douglas Slim Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Puleo International 9ft. Pre-Lit Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 6.5' Pre-Lit Flocked Virginia Pine Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Slim Franklin Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product with downswept douglas fir, pre-lit Feel Real technology, and close height (7.5 ft vs 6.5 ft). Slightly slimmer profile but still highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Classic Evergreen Spruce Traditional Green
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but different species (spruce vs douglas fir) and likely different branch tip technology and profile, reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill 7ft Pre-Lit Full Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and same species (Douglas Fir), pre-lit feature included; no mention of Feel Real or downswept style but otherwise quite relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 4.5 ft Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree but smaller height (4.5 ft) and possibly different technology and branch style, making it somewhat relevant but less so.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Wondershop 7' Pre-Lit Alberta Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit Christmas tree but different species (Alberta fir) and no detail indicating Feel Real or downswept style, lowering relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pre-lit 5' Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Pines Cones and 200 Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree, pre-lit, but smaller size (5 ft), flocked branches and pine cones differentiate it considerably from reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same species, pre-lit, and tall size, but no mention of downswept style or Feel Real branch tips; still fairly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Deluxe Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, downswept Douglas Fir, similar height, pre-lit with advanced lights; very close to the reference product with slight lighting difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Green Alcott 6' Tall Prelit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General prelit Christmas tree similar height but lacks species or downswept detail, limiting relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6.5 ft. Downswept Douglas Slim Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, downswept Douglas Fir, same height, pre-lit with clear lights; slimmer profile lowers relevancy slightly but very close overall.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 9ft. Pre-Lit Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Taller pre-lit fir tree but different species (Balsam Fir) and no downswept or Feel Real features specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6.5' Pre-Lit Flocked Virginia Pine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (Virginia Pine), flocked style, and no downswept or Feel Real features reduce relevancy significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Slim Franklin Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir species but different (Franklin Fir), slimmer profile and no mention of downswept or Feel Real technology.
